definition: wave, a great wave or surge of water
examples: the rolling billows of the sea

definition: a rolling mass (as of flame or smoke) that resembles a high wave
examples: Billows of smoke poured out of the building.

definition: to rise or roll in waves or surges
to bulge or swell out (as through action of the wind)
examples: … the flags … billowed out in pride …
a field of burning grass billowing thick black clouds of smoke into the sky
